name: Locust Swarm
description: A swarm of bugs that get into every nook and cranny of the battlefield. Some even move any stones laid out or spin thicker webs to make them harder to avoid.
effect:
- Non Bug, Fairy or Steel type pokemon take 1 damage at the end of every round.
- Bug type pokemon gain +1 Evasion.
- Berries can't be used.
